snippet.title: The First Descendant│Official Trailer Reveal (4K)│Gamescom ONL 2023
snippet.description:
Ready to dive deep into The First Descendant's universe?
Get a glimpse of what is in store for you during the upcoming Crossplay Open Beta starting September 19.
Register Now: http://tfd.nexon.com/crossplay-beta

The First Descendant is a next generation third-person co-op action RPG shooter (looter shooter) 
featuring high-quality graphics developed using Unreal Engine 5. It presents fun strategic boss fights through 4-player co-op, various unique characters, exciting gunplay, and looting.

⭐️Follow us and receive our latest news!⭐️
Official Website: https://tfd.nexon.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FirstDescendant
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FirstDescendant
Discord: https://discord.gg/thefirstdescendant
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@FirstDescendant
 
#TheFirstDescendant #TFD #lootershooter #shooter #coop #action #RPG #UE5 #UnrealEngine5 #crossplaybeta #crossplay #betatest #FirstDescendant #Descendants #steam #xbox #playstation #betatest #openbeta #gamescom #openingnightlive #gamescomONL #ONL #gameplay #gameplaytrailer #officialtrailer #cinematic #cinematictrailer #trailer
